# Stable diffusion

(Otter) images generated with stable diffusion via <https://github.com/basujindal/stable-diffusion>


```{python} 
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
import glob

def get_prompt(s):
  x = s.split('/')[-2].replace('_', ' ')
  return x

path = './img/'
files = glob.glob(path +'**/*.png', recursive=True)

for f in files:
  print(f"![{get_prompt(f)}]({f})\n\n")
```
